commit.message:
re PR c++/19258 (Incorrect access check for default argument)

	PR c++/19258
	* pt.c (push_access_scope): Handle friend defined in class.
	(pop_access_scope): Likewise.

	* g++.dg/lookup/friend6.C: New test.

From-SVN: r92993

+
+	PR c++/19258
+	* pt.c (push_access_scope): Handle friend defined in class.
+	(pop_access_scope): Likewise.
+

 	PR c++/19270
